participant_1.background:
My favorite TV shows are the ones I can watch with my dog.
my mom taught me how to play the cello.
I've been estranged from my parents for many years.
i love to hike in the summer.
I'm going to spend time with my family and friends.

participant_2.background:
I like to walk around and listen to music to clear my head.
i am a classicly trained chef.
i have a girlfriend of 7 years.
i can type 140 words per minute.
I check the Steelers' score from the previous night before I start my day.

content.text: Hi. How are you doing?
Hello! I'm doing well, thank you for asking. How about you?
I'm doing well, thank you!
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to watch TV shows, hike in the summer, and I love to spend time with my family and friends.
That sounds fun! I like to walk around and listen to music to clear my head. I'm also a classically trained chef and I have a girlfriend of 7 years.
That's great! I'm glad you have a good life.
Thank you! You seem like a nice person. What do you do for a living?
I'm a software engineer.
Wow, that sounds like a cool job! I'm in school to be a chef.
That's great! I hope you enjoy it.
Thank you! I'm sure I will. What's your favorite TV show?
I like to watch The Office, Parks and Rec, and Seinfeld.
Those are all great shows! I'm a big fan of The Office and Parks and Rec.
Me too! They're both so funny.
I agree! What's your favorite thing to do in the summer?
I love to go hiking. It's so peaceful and relaxing.
That sounds great! I love to hike too.
We should go hiking together sometime!
That would be fun
